runs.comm: casual poke first ball outside off from Mithun and not a great start. Mathews pitched it well outside off and Mithun chased it away from the body

loud appeal for lbw, that's close and gone! Mathews pitched it on short of length outside off and got it to jag back in a fair bit that beat Mithun completely. Looked plumb the first time, but will have to check replays if that was good for height. Yes, hitting middle stump easily
fullish outside off with some shape, pushed towards point
nice outswing, it was well outside off and swinging away further, Sabbir drove lazily this time and missed
towards the pads this time and Sabbir works it away easily behind square on the leg side. Wants two, but not enough time
131kph, back of length around middle and pushed back to Mathews
fullish outside off, makes him drive and a thick edge flies away to third man
back of length on middle and leg, Sarkar defends it back

leading edge and easily taken at mid-off, Sarkar is gone! It was pitched up outside off, Sarkar drove on the up and the ball went pretty high and towards the circle, where Mathews took a few steps back to pouch that. Big wicket!
just outside off, slightly full, and driven nicely to mid-off
nice swing into the batsman, gets an inside edge as Sabbir goes on the back foot to defend and the SL players get excited as it hits the back pad
confident defence this time, straight bat, head down and solidly pushed into the covers after pitched outside off
length delivery in the channel outside off, pushed down the ground by Mushfiqur
slightly slower at 126kmh, it's wide enough outside off to be left alone
charges down this time blindly, Mathews pitches it short on middle stump with the angle, and Mushfiqur slogs and misses it completely!
good bounce for the back of length ball outside off, Mushy goes on his toes and helps it to third man
not short enough to be pulled but he tries and gets a bottom edge to square leg
127kmh, in the air, just wide of point! Length delivery outside off and Mushy drove it square and on the up, maybe a thick edge, and it flew just wide of backward point for two
this wasn't that short either but he's put it away for four - the first of the match! He went across a bit and whipped it to the midwicket boundary
six this time! Went across towards off stump again and got a full delivery in the zone to loft it to the long-on boundary with sheer timing, not brute force
and a four! Cracking drive now, fullish again with room, Sabbir leaned forward and caressed it beautifully through the covers
clever shot, good placement, four more! Short of length and slower outside off, but there's width again. Sabbir waits and chops it between point and short third man
almost in the block hole now and he defends it back
high full toss, almost a no ball, on off and it's tucked to midwicket. Awkward height to hammer it away
gets another edge, goes to third man for one. Back of length and angling in, Mushy closed the face of the bat to leg but the ball didn't come in as much and took the outside edge
outside off on length, Sabbir patiently helps it to third man
wobbly delivery with some room outside off, Mushy chases away from the body and gets a bottom edge to the keeper
no width this time, short of length on off and he pushes to cover point this time

that's a mix up, Mushy has gone for a single but doesn't get the response, Mathews runs him out! He defended the back of length ball towards short cover and took off, Sabbir took a couple of steps but then stopped and that got Mushy confused. Mathews got to the ball quickly and saw Mushfiqur was barely coming back. Runs to the stumps and whips the bails off
full on the stumps, Shakib drives it down nicely and they get a single as it hits the stumps and deflects towards mid-off
starts with a good delivery around off stump, he defends it back
gives some width this time and Shakib slices it to third man
slogs from outside off, gets a thick outside edge and that flies to the fine third-man boundary for four!
crunched this time! Stays in the crease for the full delivery just outside off and drills that with some power through the covers, nobody moves
short ball, he pulls, there's a deep square leg, but he's put it away to his left and gets a third straight four! It was a bit too short and maybe he expected that after the full delivery
better delivery - slower one around off, Sabbir leans into it and turns it to the leg side for a quick one
some loop on length outside off, presses forward and pushes into off for a quick one
pretty full outside off, driven down to long-on for one
flatter one at 95kph outside off, Sabbir reverse sweeps this one with an edge behind square
Shakib tries to sweep this time, maybe a premeditated one, but the ball gets some bounce from outside off and Shakib can't put it away
just outside off on length, pushed into the covers
slower and a bit wider outside off, he waits and pushes it to point
slides it in with the angle, tucked to short fine leg where a dive keeps it to one
plays the shot a bit early to tuck it to leg, but ends up defending it back
touch fuller now and it's pushed down to long-on
flattish outside off, he gets the width and slices it late enough to beat backward point and sends it for four to the third-man boundary
absolutely full now and it's driven down to long-off this time
slow through the air and outside off, chops it off the back foot to point
short, flat and angling in, he opens up and tucks it to wide long-on
premeditated sweep for the flat delivery at 95kph outside off, misses it
makes room this time for the short delivery outside off, doesn't get the timing to clear cover
Chandimal appeals for a catch as Sabbir reverse swept the ball and didn't connect. Most likely the sound was of bat hitting the ground as the ball went past
tries to cut again off the back foot and misses his third ball in the over
so close! Shakib makes some room to guide the ball late, but it's flat and he misses it. Almost gets an edge and the off stump
full delivery this time on off, pushed down easily to long-on
nicely flighted at 79kph on off, Sabbir defends towards leg
slightly quicker at 90kph on middle and leg, it was shorter too, and Sabbir went back to defend it softly to leg for a quick single
flamingo flick for the full ball on leg, single to wide long-on
fullish on the pads and Sabbir clips it to deep square leg for one more
pretty wide outside off, Sabbir plays it fine down leg for one
short and wide outside off, Shakib cuts it off the back foot towards deep point. A fumble in the deep gets them an easy second
short and wide again, cut straight to sweeper cover this time
short of length on middle and leg, pushed down to long-on for one
better length outside off, pushed to cover
tries to drive it down but the ball angles in and gets an inside edge to go back to the bowler
comes down track aggressively, gets a full delivery and digs it down to long-on
what a beauty from Herath! Pitched it on length outside off, Sabbir leaned forward and closed the face of the bat to turn it to leg, but it turned away nicely
comes down and nearly yorks himself, finds long-on with a drive
comes down for the low full toss, doesn't time it well and sends it to long off
fullish outside off, drives firmly into the covers, gets an inside edge onto his pad for a single

swept from the middle of the bat, that's not quite gone for a six, there's a fielder there. Kapu was a yard or two inside, put his hands up and got the ball too, but it popped out and went over. That's his fifty too
short delivery, turning in, Sabbir rocks back and pulls that right from the middle of the bat between long-on and deep midwicket
what a beautiful drive, four more! Waits for the full delivery and times it so well through the covers, all along the ground
tucks this one with the turn to midwicket and he didn't use much power so they come back for the second
fuller on the pads, driven down easily to long-on
dipping slower delivery, full too, and it's pushed back to the bowler
he already has so much confidence and adds to that with a four! Clears his front foot and whacks that fullish delivery in the air and just over the covers for a cracking four
slower delivery at 112kph, just outside off, Sabbir goes across to slog and misses it as it hardly bounced
goes across to pull the short ball, mistimes it to mid-on
back of length outside off, not much room and Shakib delicately guides it to third man
slower delivery works again. 119kph, just short of length outside off, Sabbir slogs and misses again
goes way across to scoop that over, premeditated attempt, and that's way outside off for him to connect
full on off, Shakib drilled that down to long-off
charges down, Herath bowls it full and into Sabbir, he can only find long on
slow and full on leg stump, Shakib drives it back to Herath
low full toss on leg, Shakib lofts it down the ground and long-on does well to scamper to his right and keep it to one
quick one at 98kph, sliding in towards leg, Sabbir sweeps but is late on it

gets the opportunity to free his arms this time, wasn't angled in as much, and Sabbir drills it down the ground with enough power to beat long-on. Must be a relief for him, good over by Herath otherwise
146kmh, quick and full outside off, Shakib drives and sends an edge flying to third man
no ball for overstepping, full toss on off and it's slapped to deep midwicket for one
very close to the wide line, it was in the block hole outside off, Shakib chased it but it was too quick and he missed it
almost in the block hole outside off, steers it to third man
119kph, short of length slower ball outside off, that's been troubling Sabbir and he can't connect again
full and swinging in away outside off, chases and misses, and it's a wide
that's clean, that's huge, well and over deep midwicket! Slower short ball outside off, he takes a step down and hammers that with a pull high and over the boundary
connects with the slower ball again but holes out this time! Almost went down on a knee as it was fuller around off, nearly swept that one and found Jayasuriya at deep midwicket
slower ball from the back of the hand outside off, it's too full and Shakib goes down to sweep that away for four!
punches that one with a straight bat down to mid-off now
slow legcutter outside off, helps it to short third man for a quickie
fires it full around off, slogs it down to long on
almost in the block hole and what a shot, what a flick! cleared his front foot and flicked that away with great timing over square leg's head
in the block hole and Mahmudullah digs it out, back to the bowler
too full with room, Shakib cracks it through the covers in the air and a spectacular dive from Jayasuriya at cover, to his right, but it's out of his reach
too quick a bouncer for Shakib to hook that in time, top edge goes high and Chandimal goes a step or two to his right to pouch it easily
123kph, nicely bowled outside off, slow legcutter and Mahmudullah pokes and misses
takes the pace off again, 122kph, it was shorter and wider, and Mahmudullah gets some bottom edge for a single
quicker at 14kph, swinging away outside off and Nurul chases and misses
he connects with the scoop from outside off, sends it high and fine but didn't get enough for four. Third man runs in and keeps it to one
charges down and gets a bottom edge into the covers for one
short and slow, poor delivery as he gets enough time to pull it away right in the gap between deep square leg and deep midwicket for four!

whacks the full delivery back, almost through Kula's hands, and it was only a single to mid-off but there was nobody at the bowler's end to collect the throw and they take an overthrow. Sloppy stuff from SL
bit too full and that's tonked back, straight and high for a clean six! Right from the middle of the bat and that was dead straight
fullish outside off, Mahmudullah opens up and drive-scoops it to sweeper cover
in the block hole as he comes down and blocks it back to the bowler

mix up and Chameera doesn't get a direct hit! It was fullish outside off, Mahmudullah got a bottom edge and didn't run, but Nurun went across a long way and Chameera fired a throw at the bowler's end but missed. They run across eventually
goes across a bit and looks to whip it over midwicket but gets a leading edge and that's an easy catch for Mathews at cover
short and wide, Mahmudullah chases and misses but it's a wide
shortish outside off, Mahmudullah slaps it down to long-on and there's no time for a second
excellent running from Mashrafe! Short and quick at 145kph outside off, gets a bottom edge just past the keeper to third man and he hares back to the keeper's end
tries to slog the slower ball to the leg side, misses, but Mahmudullah makes it even though Chandimal hit the stumps

slower one on back of length outside off, Mahmudullah gets a big edge over the covers and they make it easily for two. Mahmudullah stops then, but Mashrafe wants a third but he doesn't make it for the third
